verses.verse: When Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought back <S%H7725><s%> those who returned <S%H7725><s%> to Zion, <S%H6726><s%> we were like those who dream. <S%H2492><s%>

Then our mouth <S%H6310><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with laughter, <S%H7814><s%> and our tongue <S%H3956><s%> with singing. <S%H7440><s%> Then they said <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great things for them. <S%H1431><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1431><s%> for us, <S%H8056><s%> and we are glad.
Restore our fortunes <S%H7622><s%> again, <S%H7725><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> like the streams <S%H650><s%> in the Negev. <S%H5045><s%>
Those who sow <S%H2232><s%> in tears <S%H1832><s%> will reap <S%H7114><s%> in joy. <S%H7440><s%>

He who goes <S%H3212><s%> out <S%H1980><s%> weeping, <S%H1058><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> for sowing, <S%H4901><s%> will certainly <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> again with joy, <S%H7440><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> his sheaves. <S%H485><s%>
